name: Time Legacy
description:
This game was made during the game jam organized by flat226 in may 2019.

It s a narrative/puzzle game where your goal is to find out why and how your grandfather died.

Credits:

Alexis Audrain : Game designer

Benoit Estival : Programmer

Ti'ihiva Farnham : Programmer
